entry.title: Adenium obesum subsp. Boehmianum (Bushman's poison)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CACTUS EN LIGNE
Type: Plant
Price: 25.99 - 39.99 (2 variants)

Adenium obesum subsp. Boehmianum, or simply known as Adenium boehmianum, is a slow-growing shrub with succulent stems. These are easy plants to grow, provided they get enough sunlight and warmth. 

Many types of Adenium, also known as Desert Rose, come from very arid and rocky regions of Africa and the Arabian Peninsula. These plants start quite small and grow slowly into impressive specimens with thick fat trunks and short upright branches. Adenium can produce many flowers in the spring and fall and it is normal for the leaves to drop in the winter. 

  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Shipped in a plastic nursery pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
 Bright light, avoid direct sun on the caudex
 Water moderately when 1 inch of soil is dry, reduce in winter
 Large pink and white flowers
Toxic to animals
 Growth : Tree-like, 1-2 m
 Origin : Yemen, Saudi Arabia, East Africa
 Grown in Canada

.

entry.title: Sansevieria Cylindrica (Snake Plant) 4''
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 14.95

Sansevieria, also known as snake plants, are among the most popular and robust of house plants. They are especially sought after for their air purifying qualities.

Sansevieria can tolerate extremely dry temperatures and a variety from lighting conditions from quite bright to very low light. They are slow growing and sculptural, making perfect office plants. 

  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Our plants are shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
 Low light to bright indirect light
 Water thoroughly when soil is completely dry
 Rarely
 Toxic to animals
 Growth: Upright, 3 ft
 Origin : Tropical Africa
 Grown in Canada

Begonia Venosa, is a semi-succulent, upright type begonia native to Brazil. It has thick, round, leathery leaves that are covered with fine white hair. This stunning plant is meant to be kept as an indoor plant because of its gorgeous foliage and adorable flowers.

entry.title: Sansevieria Whale Fin 4"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Plant

Whale Fin Sansevieria succulents are quite unique-looking and make great statement pieces for indoor gardening. As the name suggests, the plant is shaped curiously like a whale fin, stiff, erect and large. The Whale Fin is highly prized by plant enthusiasts for its unique shape and variegated foliage. 

Sansevieria can tolerate extremely dry temperatures and a variety from lighting conditions from quite bright to very low light. They are slow growing and sculptural, making perfect office plants.

Crassula marchandi, or Crassula x marchandi, is best known to be a beautiful looking succulent. As the plant matures you can expect it to reach up to 12 cm (5″) tall. It has shiny leaves that are usually a deep green to dark maroon in color. It blooms tiny green flowers. They are relatively low maintenance.

Vendor: Cactus en ligne

Agave victoriae-reginae, the Queen Victoria agave or royal agave, is a small species. This agave is highly variable in form, but in general the rosettes are small and compact, growing to 0.5m. They are composed of short, rigid, thick leaves that are green with a pattern of distinctive white markings.

entry.title: Agave Americana 4''
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 9.99

There are over 200 species of Agave found across the Americas. These plants can grow to huge sizes in their natural habitats, living for many decades and flowering only once before dying. But as they grow fairly slowly, they make perfectly sized indoor plants. Agave prefer hot, dry conditions with very little water or care needed. 

  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
 Full sun
 Water when soil is completely dry
 Rarely
 Toxic to animals
 Growth : Rosette, up to 2 ft
 Origin : Central, South America
 Grown in Canada

entry.title: Aeonium "Mint Saucer" 4"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 12.95

Aeonium are peculiar plants that grow colourful rosettes at the end of long, bare stems. These plants are winter growers, needing slightly more water during this period of the year. Aeonium go dormant in the summer, but should not be left to dry out completely like a cactus or succulent.
  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Our plants are shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
 A few hours of direct sunlight
 Water moderately when 1-2 inches of soil are dry
 Rarely
Non-toxic to animals
 Growth : Rosette, 1-3 feet
 Origin : Canary Islands
 Grown in Canada

If giving this plant outdoor, direct sun, it is best to introduce it gradually.

entry.title: Sansevieria Zeylanica
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en Ligne
Type: Plant

This Sansevieria has tall grayish-green leaves in striped patterns. It is known for its air-purifying ability and is highly recommended for bedrooms, living rooms, offices, and hospital rooms. In Feng Shui, Sansevierias are considered plants that bring good luck.

This Sansevieria requires so little care that it makes it a perfect plant for indoor gardening beginners.
